Feature: Weather API
Status: Completed full integration with ABC API.
What's new?
Air quality metrics: AQI, PM10, PM2.5, NO2, SO2, CO, O3, NH3, NO and pollen level.
Atmospheric conditions: Temperature, Humidity, Wind Gusts, Wind Speed, Wind Direction.

Feature: Table Widget
Status: Parameters can now be tracked at an equipment level.
What's new?
Users can now track On, Idle and Off time for each piece of equipment.
Users can customize parameters and ranges based on client needs.

li.p: Status: Completed API integration with UK regional Carbon Intensity forecast.

ol.li: Forecasts carbon intensity and generation mix 96+ hours ahead for each of the 14 geographical regions in Great Britain.

li.p: Clients can now schedule and minimise CO2 emissions at regional level.
Powered by state-of-the-art machine learning and sophisticated power system modelling.
Applies to electricity generation only. Accounts for national electricity demand, embedded wind, and solar generation.
Includes emissions from all large-metered power stations, interconnector imports, transmission and distribution losses.
